data.title: "Promethean Love: Paul Kurtz and the Humanistic Perspective on Love" by Timothy Madigan
data.meta_description: The myth of Prometheus has inspired countless generations of humanists throughout the ages. This collection of essays includes the Promethean myth and its relationship to the philosophy of love. It is explored from its origins in Ancient Greece, to its similarities and contrasts with the figure of Christ. -- Worldcat Summary
data.text:
Description

The myth of Prometheus has inspired countless generations of humanists throughout the ages. This collection of essays includes the Promethean myth and its relationship to the philosophy of love. It is explored from its origins in Ancient Greece, to its similarities and contrasts with the figure of Christ. -- Worldcat Summary
